channel.title: Safe pk area
channel.description: Hey, i'm currently using a trisidiax 317 pi server. i want to add pvp area (safe) but idk how tuts told me to search for "public boolean nonWild() {" but i couldn't find it can someone help?

item.title: Safe pk area
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“beats, post:1, topic:506825”]Hey, i’m currently using a trisidiax 317 pi server. i want to add pvp area (safe) but idk how
tuts told me to search for “public boolean nonWild() {” but i couldn’t find it can someone help?[/quote]

public boolean isInSafePK() { return absX >= lowest x coord in pk area && absX <= highest x coord in pk area && absY >= lowest y coord in pk area && absY <= highest y coord in pk area }
Example:

public boolean isInSafePK() {
return (absX >= 500 && absX <= 550 && absY >= 604 && absY <= 654) || (add other things with that syntax);
}

then make it not delete items when dying and “isInSafePK()” is true
ex:

dying method { if(isInSafePK()) don't remove items else { remove items }

Read full topic
